titleInfo.title: INTELLIGENCE AUTHORIZATION ACT FOR FISCAL YEAR 2018

extension.searchTitle: INTELLIGENCE AUTHORIZATION ACT FOR FISCAL YEAR 2018; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 128

congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2018
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House passed H.R. 3180, to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2018 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, the Community Management Account, and the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, by a yea-and-nay vote of 380 yeas to 35 nays, Roll No. 437.

titleInfo.title: DEPARTMENT OF VETERANS AFFAIRS BONUS TRANSPARENCY ACT

extension.searchTitle: DEPARTMENT OF VETERANS AFFAIRS BONUS TRANSPARENCY ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 128

congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: Department of Veterans Affairs Bonus Transparency Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House passed S. 114, to amend title 38, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to submit an annual report regarding performance awards and bonuses awarded to certain high-level employees of the Department of Veterans Affairs, by a yea-and-nay vote of 414 yeas with none voting ``nay'', Roll No. 438.
